title: I'm going to a JYP online audition for rap, should I pick a very fast song or a slow emotional song to express my stage presence? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should always go for what you like but also fits best with your voice and abilities. If you think you’re great at both, why don’t you throw in a quick mix? I don’t think it would matter as long as it doesn’t take up too much time. What I mean is you can start out slow and in that one performance, you switch it up to rapping or the other way around. Rap first then switch to singing.
Pick something that you are emotionally attached to. If it has a good flow….…slow or fast, this would be awesome. With rap, you want that awesome flow and meaning!!!!
